data.text: @ngumenyuk @dkaleniuk @UNOCHA @UN @UNHumanRights @NATO @antonioguterres #RedCross where is the humanitarian support in Ukraine ??  Where are actions fo cover the words ?? #PutinWarCriminal

@ngumenyuk Time is running out. It's for HUMANITY: everyone can do more to pressure their government to take more action and provide REAL support to #Ukraine, including lethal weapons: #StopPutin #StandWithUkriane @EmmanuelMacron @POTUS @JustinTrudeau @OlafScholz @europeanunion #Europe
